task_description:
This is the user's previous chat history with this AI:

User: add a button with text Free
AI: To add a button with text "Free", Please follow these steps:

1. Open the HTML file in your code editor.
2. Choose the location where you want to add the button.
3. Use the following code to create a button with the text "Free":

```html
<button>Free</button>
```

4. Save the changes and preview the HTML file in your web browser to see the button.
This is the user's current request of changes to be made: add a button
